item.title: Robot Love
item.description: Robot Love Robot Love A common argument against men having relationships and marrying robot girls is that the robot girl’s love is fake, because she was programmed to love you. Supposedly, only real women can provide real love. Argument Nr. 1: The Chinese Room Thought Experiment “The Chinese room argument holds that a computer executing a program cannot have a mind, understanding, or consciousness,[a] regardless of how intelligently or human-like the program may make the computer behave.
